description:
Python web applications running in the browser or mobile without a
Server? What seemed to be a dream just a few months ago is not possible
thanks to PyScript. It is now possible to write websites, apps, and
games running entirely on the browser.

This Tutorial is an introduction to PyScript and will walk you through
learning about basic concepts, how to set up your project and create
amazing applications. More specifically: - Create your project
configuration - Define a python environment with all the dependencies to
run your code - Loading and manipulating with user data - Writing your
python code - Accessing the DOM and other browser features - Using
Javascript libraries from your Python application - Optimizing your
application - Look at what’s different between “standard” python vs.
Python on the browser - Have a lot of fun and hack together on your
ideas!
title: Writing Serverless Python Web Apps with PyScript
